altername_name: Edamoto Naomi no Shiawase Kitchen: Kakushi Aji wa Anata ga Kimete ne
name: Imagine: Master Chef
overview: Imagine Master Chef allows players to create recipes from all over the world using the stylus to prepare, stir and cook ingredients. Players can customize their kitchens with utensils and appliances. Fun mini-games include cooking quizzes and kitchen challenges. Bon appetit!
